name: Super Robot Wars Z
description:
Super Robot Wars Z is a Anime Fighting game with Grendizer , Devilman , Mazinger , Getter Robot , Jeeg and many other robots , Love, revenge, pride. Everyone has a reason to fight. Values are what give us a reason to live and make us human, regardless of our weaknesses or strengths. There are no wrong reasons, only the path we decide to take. Super Robot Wars Z lets you experience the iconic gameplay of the series along with implementing new 3D visuals, which is for the first time in a mainline entry in the series! Embark on the ultimate action journey of Robot fighting, battle hungry and larger than life robots! unleash unique and devastating moves
